Care Connect Immunization Explanation Reason

A code to record the reason why a vaccine was administered.

Copyright Statement: Copyright © 2016 HL7 UK

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include all codes defined in https://fhir.hl7.org.uk/STU3/CodeSystem/CareConnect-ImmunizationExplanationReason-1

name: Care Connect Immunization Explanation Reason
description: A code to record the reason why a vaccine was administered.
